tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The SASB Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The SASB Taxonomy was designed for companies to report their ESG information that follows SASB standards in a structured machine-readable data format (i.e. XBRL) to the investor and analyst community and other users of companies' non-financial information. The intent is for companies to 'digitally tag' ESG information within their current regulatory filings (e.g. Forms 10-K/Q with the US SEC, foreign equivalents, etc.), within their Corporate Social Responsibility reports, or other reporting format.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: The complete SASB taxonomy including document & entity information
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the SASB Taxonomy. Related taxonomies are also imported.
